title: How to get WTK or WorkTHR WorkTokens by mining BNB?
content: See how to mine WTK & WorkTHR WorkTokens for tools & games by mining BNB, depositing BNB to the platform for WorkTokens and withdrawing WorkTokens from the platform.

title: How to mine WorkTokens & WorkTHR with our full web miner?
content: See how to mine WTK and WorkTHR WorkTokens for tools & games or withdraw to your Metamask wallet by registering for our full miner.

title: How to mine with our light web miner?
content: See how to mine WorkTokens for tools & games and withdraw to your Metamask wallet without a registration.

title: How to trade BNB, ETH and other coins for WTK & WorkTHR WorkTokens on pancake swap?
content: See how to get WorkTokens for tools & games by trading on the pancake swap.
